result.reason: DataTableDeserializer crashes on older MSSQL schemas missing columns added in later upgrades (e.g. RedirectClipboard from v26→27) because it lacks Columns.Contains guards
result.approach: Add dataRow.Table.Columns.Contains() guards for all columns introduced by SQL schema upgraders (RedirectClipboard, RedirectAudioCapture, etc.), following the existing pattern already used for IsTemplate (line 108) and EnvironmentTags (line 165)

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"DataTableDeserializer crashes on older MSSQL schemas missing columns added in later upgrades (e.g. RedirectClipboard from v26→27) because it lacks Columns.Contains guards","priority":"P2-bug","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/Config/Serializers/ConnectionSerializers/Sql/DataTableDeserializer.cs"],"approach":"Add dataRow.Table.Columns.Contains() guards for all columns introduced by SQL schema upgraders (RedirectClipboard, RedirectAudioCapture, etc.), following the existing pattern already used for IsTemplate (line 108) and EnvironmentTags (line 165)"}
